name: Design Crafters
details: It is a design course selling website where student can buy a course Instructor can add a class and admin can make a use admin or instructor
features: Student can add a course in his card and pay for the course by using Stripe
Instructor can add a class and see his class status
Admin can make a user admin or instructor.Also he can approved or deny a class

name: Super Toy
details: It is a toy related website , Here use can add a toy,delete and modify his own added toy and see all added toy.
features: This website is a Super hero toy related website.
Here I use Mongo DB as a data base for this website.
I use CRUD operation for load and write and delete data from server.

name: TechCareer
details: It is a job related website any tech person can find a job and can see the job Details and the apply for the job and the job will show on Applied Jobs by using Local storage database
features: This project is about a job tech job site project where we can apply for jobs.
Home page where It show all the page details and we can see the job category and job Featured and what kind of job are available.
Applied Jobs section show all the Applied jobs by using local storage.

name: Food Fun
details: It is Food Related website.Here we can see Top Chef in home page and When we Click view details the we can see the chef details and his 3 recipes.we also implement user authentication by using firebase
features: This website is a food related website.
Data from sever site and load data on website.
email passowrd log in and register and also git hub and google firebase Authentication.
